trans-unit.source: Represents a line used to group items of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> or the drop-down items of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> or other <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control.
Use a ToolStripSeparator to group related items on a menu or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
The ToolStripSeparator is automatically spaced and oriented horizontally or vertically to accord with its container.
You can add a ToolStripSeparator at design time by choosing it from a drop-down list.

However, you can also automatically create a ToolStripSeparator by typing a hyphen (-) in either the designer template node or in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> method.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator"></xref> class.

Gets the spacing between the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator"></xref> and an adjacent item.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value representing the spacing.
Gets the default size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator"></xref>, measured in pixels.
The default is 100 pixels horizontally.
